description:
A twin engine medium lift helicopter, the Siokorvsky Sea Sergeant is a general use craft for the U.N. Navy. Armed with four air dropped self-propelled torpedoes, the Sea Sergeant can be used to attack targets above or below the water. The Sea Sergeant is also used as a navy reconnaissance craft and a search and rescue vehicle. When Space War I began, the Zentradi landed numerous mecha forces in the sea surrounding Souht Ataria Island on Earth. Quick thinking First Lieutenant http://anidb.net/ch7652 [Hayase Misa] ordered patrol helicopters dispatched from the http://anidb.net/ch48774 [Prometheus] to scout the area. Patrol helicopter PHP-202 reported contact but was unfortunately shot down.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/sdfmacross/seasergeant.htm
name: Sea Sergeant
